alert.note: Alert for Great Salt Lake Desert and Mountains; Northern Wasatch Front; Salt Lake Valley; Wasatch Mountains I-80 North (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 27 at 11:22AM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...AN AREA OF SNOW SHOWERS WILL AFFECT SOUTHWESTERN WEBER... SOUTHEASTERN BOX ELDER...NORTHWESTERN SALT LAKE AND DAVIS COUNTIES... At 1117 AM MDT...an area of snow showers are located from Ogden through Salt Lake City. The snow showers were nearly stationary. Locations impacted include... Salt Lake City, West Valley City, Ogden, Layton, Bountiful, Farmington, Hill Air Force Base, Roy, Clearfield, Kaysville, Syracuse, South Salt Lake, Clinton, North Ogden, South Ogden, North Salt Lake, Centerville, Woods Cross, Washington Terrace and Riverdale. This includes the following highways... Interstate 15 between mile markers 304 and 349. Interstate 84 between mile markers 82 and 89. Interstate 80 in Utah between mile markers 103 and 130. * snowfall accumulation of 1 to 3 inches is expected by the end of these snow showers, especially on the benches. Snow covered roads are possible and may create hazardous driving conditions.

area.areaDesc: Great Salt Lake Desert and Mountains; Northern Wasatch Front; Salt Lake Valley; Wasatch Mountains I-80 North
